A '''boss''' is a type of mob that is significantly stronger than standard mobs. They can usually be identified by displaying their health as a [[boss bar]] when fought, however some games like {{MCSM}} never display boss bars. Bosses typically represent a significant event or the conclusion of a prior challenge or level.

A '''mini boss''', called a '''powerful mob''' in {{MCD}}, is a weaker version of a boss that usually does not have a boss bar.
